column6: 2015. jean was the son of the late leveque & ismelie (michel). beloved husband of marie (senat) jean will also be missed by his friends and relatives. relatives and friends are invited to attend visiting hours on friday june 19th from 7-9pm at the joseph russo funeral home
column8: roslindale. a mass of christian burial will be celebrated on saturday june 20th at saint angela's church
column9: 1548 blue hill ave. mattapan at 11:30am. interment will be in oak lawn cemetery. joseph russo funeral home814 american legion highway roslindale
